alert.note: Alert for North Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 4:08PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Itasca and northeastern Cass Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 408 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Ball Club, or 19 miles west of Grand Rapids, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Days High Landing around 425 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Deer River, Zemple and Pokegama Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
